suite.name: Tasks

test.name: Order robots from RobotSpareBin Industries Inc

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Open Available Browser
kw.doc: Attempts to open a browser on the user's device from a set of supported browsers. Automatically downloads a corresponding webdriver if none is already installed.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.
Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

Attempted combinations:

BrowserDownloadError
ChromeFalseMessage: 'chromedriver' executable needs to be in PATH. Please see https://chromedriver.chromium.org/home
ChromeTrue

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: Check, if browser was opened properly
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

suite.doc: Orders robots from RobotSpareBin Industries Inc. Saves the order HTML receipt as a PDF file. Saves the screenshot of the ordered robot. Embeds the screenshot of the robot to the PDF receipt. Creates ZIP archive of the receipts and the images.
